title: What Next for Ineos Grenadiers as Backers Blow Budget into Manchester United?
content:
Ineos boss Ratcliffe acquires 25 percent, Tour de France ace Brailsford to have 'prominent role' in soccer squad in latest off-season twist for struggling cycling crew.

Read the full article at What Next for Ineos Grenadiers as Backers Blow Budget into Manchester United? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
